title: His Christmas Cookie
description: Cookie wasn't looking for love when her sister brought home two hot Russians. But now one of them won't keep his hands to himself and she's not sure she wants him to. He's moved in next door and she can't help but wonder…what's he doing over there all alone?Frost didn't plan on falling for his sister-in-law, but one look and he was done for. Now all he's got to do is convince her he's the one…before it's too late.Warning: Did we throw in a holiday kidnapping? You bet your sweet tinsel we did! Count on us to deliver all the festive feels while having a big growly alpha save the day!
author: Alexa Riley
